bibl.title: The Corn Supply of Ancient Rome.
bibl.seg: Rickman Geoffrey, The Corn Supply of Ancient Rome.
Oxford - New York, Clarendon Press, 1980, 8°, xiii-209 pp.

C.R. par P.W. de Neeve, Mnemosyne 4a s., 38 (1985) pp. 443-448. - Barbette Stanley Spaeth, AJP 105 (1984) pp. 361-363. - R.J.A. Wilson, Hermathena 134 (1983) pp. 85-89. - J. Burian, Gymnasium 90 (1983) pp. 350-352. - L. de Blois, TG 95 (1982) pp. 97-98. - E. Deniaux, Latomus 41 (1982) pp. 192-193. - J.-Cl. Richard, RPhil 3e s., 56 (1982) pp. 369-370. - E. Noè, Athenaeum N.S., 59 (1981) pp. 543-545. - N. Purcell, JRS 71 (1981) pp. 197-198. - J. v. Ungern-Sternberg, MusHelv 39 (1982) p. 340. - R.M. Grant, AHR 86 (1981) pp. 379-380. - D. Stockton, CR N.S., 31 (1981) pp. 91-93.
